title: String to Character Array
description: In this lab, we will explore how to convert a string into an array of characters in JavaScript. This is a common task in programming when dealing with strings, as it allows you to manipulate individual characters within the string. By using the spread operator, we can easily convert a string into an array of characters in just a few lines of code.

meta.title: Convert String to Character Array in JavaScript
meta.description: Learn how to convert a string into an array of characters in JavaScript using the spread operator.
meta.keywords: character array, javascript, javascript practice, javascript practice online, coding, javascript lab, javascript tutor, programming, string

verify.name: Verify Node Commands In Zsh History
